school_name: Georgia State University Perimeter College - Decatur

comments: Funny thing is, I actually am going to take her again. Brilliant and funny teacher; it is probably one of the easiest and most enjoyable classes I\'ve taken. It\'s a very relaxed environment, and if you\'re interested in history, you\'ll love it. She\'s very understanding and patient with students. The tests are basically free points.

comments: April Williams is a great teacher! I really enjoyed her class. I took a class that met only once a week for three hours, but those hours went by very fast. She has great stories, power points, and useful hints to help you do better in the class. She honestly wants you to succeed.
